home.title-always-happy: 幸せに毎日を生きていく開発者、
home.desc-1p-1: 開発をして大変な時も多いのですが、
home.desc-1p-2: 実装した時の喜びはずっと開発をさせる原動力になります。
home.desc-2p-1: その喜びを誰よりもよく知るので
home.desc-2p-2: いつも勉強し、成長していきます。
home.desc-2p-3: 喜びを感じるために、今後も絶えず勉強します。
home.desc-3p-1: 私の詳細については、introduceメニューで確認してください。

desc.1p-2: ユーザーがウェブサイトやアプリケーションを使用するときに良い経験を提供したいフロントエンド開発者の郑惠印です。
desc.2p-1: 私はユーザーの目にしっかりと入ってページを刻印させるとともに、UI/UXにも気を使うことを大切にしています。
desc.2p-2: ユーザーが簡単に理解して使用できる直感的なインターフェースを構築し、
desc.2p-3: 視覚的に魅力的でモダンなデザインを実現することに情熱を持っています。
desc.3p-1: 常にクリエイティブでコラボレーションを重視する開発者として最善を尽くしています。
desc.3p-2: 学生会長、サークル活動、開発コラボレーションなどを進め、得た経験を通じて、他の職務の人々とも円滑なコミュニケーションが可能です。
desc.4p-1: マッサージに幸せで肯定的な態度で取り組んで、
desc.4p-2: 単純なコーディングだけでなく、コミュニケーションとコラボレーションでも良い結果を生み出します。

typing.random-1: 幸せに毎瞬最善を尽くす
typing.random-4: ユーザーの利便性を考える

interest.1-desc: 想像を現実に具現する、
interest.2-desc: 美しい瞬間を記録する、
interest.3-desc: 複数の楽器が一つの音楽になる、
interest.3-name: バンド合奏（ドラム演奏）

education.science-gen: Gyeongsangbuk-do Office Education Science Gifted Education Center

awards.money: 성적우수 장학, 밝은사회 장학, SW중심대학 장학 ... 외 다수 장학 수혜
awards.sanjose: 2023 San Jose State University Enterpreneurship Award Grand Prize
awards.khu: 2022 KyungHee Univ. College Of Software Club Competition Grand Prize
awards.edu: 2021 Educational Donation Contest For College Students Encouragement Prize

esim.title: World-ESIM
esim.subtitle: - ESIM Sales Site
esim.user: (actually provide services in Japan, South Korea, and the United States)
esim.desc-1: We developed and distributed websites that sell physical products to API products
esim.desc-2: to Japanese airports, Japanese store kiosks, and various apps.
esim.desc-3: It was conducted by 3 front-end developers, 3 back-end developers, and a design team/planning team.
esim.desc-4: Among them, I'm a temporary PL (project leader) and front-end developer
esim.desc-5: I did component diagram, usecase diagram, initial component setting(countBox, button, dropDown, all of modal...), register/login page, my page, product detail page, payment page, support multilingual, api connection, initial settings such as localStorage and headers, RWD (Responsive Web Design), Separate and integrate frequently used functions/components such as getQueryString and modalManager, regular expression, code refactoring, etc.

esim-admin.title: World-ESIM admin service
esim-admin.subtitle: - ESIM Sales Manager Site
esim-admin.user: (actually provide services in Japan, South Korea, and the United States)
esim-admin.desc-1: As a site dedicated to managers selling ESIM, we have developed and distributed a website
esim-admin.desc-2: that allows you to register, modify, sell, and settle all products from physical products to API products.
esim-admin.desc-3: It was conducted by 3 front-end developers, 3 back-end developers, and a design team/planning team.
esim-admin.desc-4: Among them, I'm a temporary PL (project leader) and front-end developer
esim-admin.desc-5: I did component diagram, usecase diagram, initial component setting(table, imageUploader, excelUploader, sideMenu...), login page, modifying Members (Administrators) page, product registration page, api connection, initial settings such as localStorage and headers, Separate and integrate frequently used functions/components such as getQueryString and modalManager, regular expression, code refactoring, etc.

nfm-trd.title: Museum of memory - come to my memory
nfm-trd.subtitle: - Memory History Mobile Web Content
nfm-trd.user: (20,000 actual users, 2023 Chuseok Ga Open/2024 Lunar New Year~ Official operation)
nfm-trd.desc-1: It is a web content conducted in the third hall of the National Folk Museum of Korea,
nfm-trd.desc-2: and a website was developed and distributed to record memories targeting middle-aged people.
nfm-trd.desc-3: It was conducted with 3 developers, 2 designers, 1 planner, and 1 development mentor.
nfm-trd.desc-4: Among them, I am PL (project leader) and I am in charge of front end, back end, and DB
nfm-trd.desc-5: I did initial front-end development settings, redirect setting, regular expression, front end of nickname/age input page, front end of relics selection page, front-end of record page, front/back-end of result page, front/back-end of share page, background/click functionality and applications, 'Press to unmute' function (apply as needed on each page), a personal URL sharing function with uuid., differentiation after classifying owners/visitors, etc.

focuz.title: FOCUZ
focuz.subtitle: - Facial Recognition Cam Study Website
focuz.user: (KyungHee Univ. College Of Software Club Competition Grand Prize)
focuz.desc-1: It differentiates it from existing video conference programs and study programs
focuz.desc-2: to analyze study concentration by measuring face recognition time.
focuz.desc-3: It was conducted with two front-end members, two back-end members, and two mentors.
focuz.desc-4: Among them, I am front-end developer
focuz.desc-5: I did page routing, register/login(kakao auth), study page(utilize the sensorflow library), add friend/group page,friend/group list page(develop page, component), create study group page, analysis page (calinder date setting, time graphing), etc.

bburing.title: BBuRing_log
bburing.subtitle: - National Chicken restaurant record website
bburing.desc-1: You can record reviews for each store
bburing.desc-3: It was conducted with one front end developer and one back end developer.
bburing.desc-4: Among them, I am front-end developer
bburing.desc-5: I did page routing, main page, site guide page(animation), kakao map api-assign marker, search chicken store, search posts(view reviews by store when you click on a map, preview mouse hovershoots), write page, etc.

eclipse.title: Eclipse
eclipse.subtitle: - A Website For Solving College Students' Career Concerns
eclipse.desc-1: It was planned for college students who are worried about their career
eclipse.desc-2: due to the disconnection of their senior/junior relationship after COVID-19.
eclipse.desc-3: It was conducted with two front-end developers and two back-end developers.
eclipse.desc-4: Among them, I am front-end developer
eclipse.desc-5: I did design, initial front-end development settings, page routing, main page, login page, faculty-student communication page, timetable recommendation page, profile page, sponsoring page, check the alarm page, etc.

gallery.title: gallery web
gallery.subtitle: - a website where you can record your photos
gallery.desc-1: For those who like to take pictures,
gallery.desc-2: I have planned a website that can be recorded on the website.
gallery.desc-3: I proceeded with the toy project by myself.
gallery.desc-4: I did design, initial front-end development settings, page routing, main page, register/login page, modify personal information page, uploading text/photos feature, the functions of checking, modifying, and deleting posts

apartment.title: Search For Apartment Transactions
apartment.subtitle: - A website where you can check the actual transaction price of an apartment
apartment.desc-1: You can select the area you want to see the actual sale price of the apartment,
apartment.desc-2: and go to the property site.
apartment.desc-3: We proceeded with one front end developer and one api crawler.
apartment.desc-4: Among them, I am front-end developer
apartment.desc-5: I did design, initial front-end development settings, api connection, search feature, etc.
